data.prayer: Spirit, please defend the 33,935 believers in Mumbai City against an unwillingness to suffer. Give them courage to face social rejection.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Mumbai City, Maharashtra, India
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Lord, let it be said of the 3,051,065 lost in Mumbai City that you have called them out of darkness into your glorious light.
data.verse: But you are a chosen race, a royal priesthood, a holy nation, a people for God’s own possession, that you may proclaim the excellence of him who called you out of darkness into his marvelous light

data.section_summary: On average, 2 people will die without Jesus in the next hour in Mumbai City, Maharashtra, India.
data.prayer: Spirit, send your gospel to these.
Lord, stir the hearts of your people in Mumbai City to agree with you and with one another.
Father, for all those you call to look after your flock from the 33,935 believers in Mumbai City, please, make them passionate about hearing your Word.
data.verse: Therefore, you shepherds, hear the word of the LORD.

data.prayer: Lord God, I thank you that the blood of Christ, who through the eternal Spirit offered himself without defect to God, can cleanse the Ellamalawar people conscience from dead works to serve the living God.
Lord, like in the church of Antioch, where you gathered many prophets and teachers, please gather many prophets and teachers in the county of Mumbai City, Maharashtra, India.
data.verse: Now in the church at Antioch there were prophets and teachers: Barnabas, Simeon called Niger, Lucius of Cyrene, Manaen (who had been brought up with Herod the tetrarch), and Saul.

data.prayer: Father, send out evangelists who will challenge people like Peter who said, "Repent and be baptized, every one of you" in the county of Mumbai City, Maharashtra, India.
data.verse: Peter replied, “Repent and be baptized, every one of you, in the name of Jesus Christ for the forgiveness of your sins. And you will receive the gift of the Holy Spirit.

data.prayer: Father, give the disciples of the the county of Mumbai City an urgency of seeing every people and place reached for the gospel.
data.verse: As long as it is day, we must do the works of him who sent me. Night is coming, when no one can work.
